**Core Idea**: Use white space intentionally - not too cramped, not wastefully empty.

**How to Apply**:
- Proper vertical rhythm (consistent spacing between sections)
- Avoid excessive empty space (no giant gaps between elements)
- Keep related elements close together (visual grouping)
- Responsive spacing (more compact on mobile)
- Balance density with readability

**Tailwind Spacing Guidelines**:
- **Section gaps**: gap-8, gap-10, gap-12 (NOT gap-20, gap-32)
- **Between list items**: gap-3, gap-4, space-y-3
- **Container padding**: p-6, p-8, px-6 py-8 (NOT p-16, p-20)
- **Section margins**: mb-6, mb-8, mt-8 (NOT mb-16, mb-20)
- **Header to content**: gap-8, gap-10 (NOT gap-24, gap-32)

**Examples Across Domains**:
- Todo app: Header â†’ Task input â†’ Task list with gap-8 between sections
- Dashboard: Stat cards â†’ Charts with gap-6 between, no huge empty areas
- Form: Field groups with gap-4, section spacing with gap-8
- Profile page: Avatar â†’ Info â†’ Actions with mb-6 between sections

**Common Mistakes to AVOID**:
- âŒ Huge empty space between header and main content (py-20, py-32)
- âŒ Cramped lists with no spacing (space-y-0)
- âŒ Inconsistent spacing (gap-4 here, gap-16 there)
- âŒ Over-padding containers (p-20 when p-8 would work)

**Good Patterns**:
- âœ… Consistent vertical rhythm: gap-8 for major sections, gap-4 for related items
- âœ… Compact layouts: Header immediately followed by content area (gap-8)
- âœ… Grouped elements: Related items closer together than unrelated items
- âœ… Breathing room: Enough space to separate sections without wasting screen space
